==Useful Info==
'''Snorg the Insatiable''' is a ferocious [[unique]] [[troll (monster)|troll]] who hits hard in melee and goes [[berserk]] with reckless abandon.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]: 10-14
*[[The Lair]]: 3-6
*[[The Orcish Mines]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Going into melee against Snorg can be dangerous. Her berserk usually lasts longer than yours, hasting her and increasing the damage of her attacks by 1.5x (for an average damage/time increase of 2.25x). Summoners can spam cheap summoned monsters, letting them take her attacks and softening her up until her berserk expires. Extremely fast characters can [[kite]] her, though this usually isn't an option ([[Haste]] + better than average base move speed required). Those who want to engage her in melee should buff themselves first: a [[potion of haste]] and a [[potion of might]] will not go amiss. High defensive stats certainly also help.
*Snorg goes berserk more often when she's wounded. If you can't handle her berserking, it's best to either kill or disable her quickly or run away without hurting her.
*Killing Snorg may produce a named [[troll leather armour]] that has a chance to come pre-enchanted.
